colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @033A *, ,(CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I RIM PA GNYIS PA'I RNAM PAR BSHAD PA DNGOS GRUB KYI SNYE MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BSTAN PA'I MNGA' BDAG TU GYUR BA LHA BTZUN GANG RES RANG DGON DU SNGAGS DANG MTSAN NYID KYI 'CHANG NYAN BTZUGS PA'I TSE, DE GNYIS KYI BLA MA'I GO SAR GNAS PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG GRAGS PA BSHAD SGRUB CES BYA BAS, SNGAR SLOB DPON RDO RJE 'CHANG BLO BZANG SBYIN PA DANG, KHRI CHEN BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS RNAM PA GNYIS KYI DRUNG DU CHOS 'DI'I DBANG 'KHRID SOGS LEGS PAR MNOS SHING, DON CUNG ZAD SHES PA'I SGO NAS NYAMS LEN PHYOGS TZAM ZHIG BGYIS PA'I MTHU DANG, KHYAD PAR 'DI'I RDZOGS RIM GYI 'KHRID TZAM ZHIG SNANG YANG, ,'DIR GZHUNG CHE BA NAS BSHAD TSUL SOGS JI LTAR YIN PA DANG, KHA BSKONG DGOS PA DAG GIS LA BSKANGS NAS RJE DANG MKHAS GRUB YAB SRAS KYIS PHYE BA BZHIN GSAL BAR BSHAD MI 'DUG PAS, 'DIR RGYUD DON GRUB CHEN GYIS BKRAL PA'I RJES SU 'BRANG STE RJE YAB SRAS DANG CHOS RJE BLO GROS CHOS SKYONG SOGS KYI MAN NGAG LA BRTEN NAS, GZHUNG NAS BSHAD TSUL DANG, 'DUS PA DANG THUN MONG BA'I RNAM GZHAG KHA 'GENG 'OS PA DAG GIS KHA BSKANGS NAS CO NE'I GZIMS KHANG NYID DU SBYAR BA STE, 'DIS KYANG RJE BLA MA'I BSTAN PA LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
